item.title: 租金是美联储抑制美国通胀的 "最大绊脚石
item.description: 与西部和南部相比，东北部和中西部的房租上涨需要更长的时间才能缓和。【原文：Rent increases are taking longer to moderate in the Northeast and Midwest than in the West and South.】

item.title: 泰国与哈萨克斯坦达成免签证协议以促进旅游业发展
item.description: 泰国将于下周与哈萨克斯坦签署永久性双边免签证协议，因为这个东南亚国家希望将外国游客人数提高到科维德事件前的水平。【原文：Thailand will sign a permanent bilateral visa waiver agreement with Kazakhstan next week, as the Southeast Asian country looks to lift foreign tourist arrivals back to pre-Covid levels.】

item.title: 沙特阿拉伯接近达成 10 亿美元的巴基斯坦巴里克公司交易
item.description: 知情人士透露，沙特阿拉伯正逐步接近达成一项潜在交易，收购巴里克黄金公司（Barrick Gold Corp.【原文：Saudi Arabia is moving closer to a potential deal to acquire a minority stake in a Pakistan mine controlled by Barrick Gold Corp., people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 美国收紧制裁，俄罗斯石油交易商异军突起
item.description: 随着美国加大对莫斯科的制裁压力，俄罗斯与印度的原油贸易开始像一场石油打地鼠游戏。就在一家贸易商开始崭露头角时，另一家贸易商又冒了出来。【原文：As the US intensifies sanctions pressure on Moscow, Russia’s crude trade with India has begun to resemble a game of oil whack-a-mole. Just as one trader begins to gain prominence, another pops up.】

item.title: 土耳其兹拉特银行获得创纪录的 17 亿美元银团贷款
item.description: 土耳其资产规模最大的国营银行 TC Ziraat Bankasi AS 获得了 17 亿美元的一年期可持续发展挂钩银团贷款，创下了土耳其银行参与范围最广的纪录。【原文：State-run TC Ziraat Bankasi AS, Turkey’s largest lender by assets, has secured a one-year sustainability-linked syndicated loan of $1.7 billion, a record amount with the widest participation for any Turkish bank.】

item.title: 尼日利亚洪灾进一步削减可可作物，加剧可可短缺
item.description: 尼日利亚水文局警告说，该国主要的可可种植区将发生严重洪灾，因此尼日利亚的可可种植和作物中期收获将受到影响。【原文：Nigeria’s cocoa planting and mid-crop harvest will be disrupted as the Hydrological Service Agency has warned of heavy flooding in the country’s main cocoa growing areas.】

item.title: 顶级汽车供应商转向基因测试和热泵以实现增长
item.description: 罗伯特-博世有限公司正在深入其主营汽车业务以外的领域，大众汽车公司和宝马汽车公司等客户正面临电动汽车需求疲软的问题。【原文：Robert Bosch GmbH is pushing deeper into areas outside of its mainstay automotive business where customers like Volkswagen AG and BMW AG confront weakening demand for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 挪威 1.6 万亿美元基金未达基准，回报率为 6.3
item.description: 挪威1.6万亿美元的主权财富基金在第一季度的表现低于其基准，回报率连续第二年低于基准。【原文：Norway’s $1.6 trillion sovereign wealth fund underperformed its benchmark in the first quarter, with returns coming up short for a second consecutive report.】

item.title: 美国劳动力如何迷上阿德拉
item.description:
为什么我们总是欲罢不能？【原文：

Why we just can't get enough.

】

item.title: 这些新兴市场拥有抵御美元冲击的健康缓冲区
item.description: 美元走强给发展中市场带来了动荡，但好消息是，许多市场现在已经做好了充分准备，储备了大量资金来应对这种情况。【原文：As the dollar’s strength roils developing markets, the good news is that many are now well prepared with piles of reserves for just such a scenario.】

item.title: 无人机袭击后俄罗斯柴油出口继续下滑
item.description: 在无人机袭击俄罗斯炼油厂后的几周内，俄罗斯的柴油出口量持续下滑。【原文：Russia’s diesel exports are continuing to plunge in the weeks after drone attacks on the nation’s oil refineries.】

item.title: 美元威胁颠覆货币市场，亚洲站稳脚跟
item.description: 亚洲官员对重新崛起的美元发起了进攻，其中一些人选择站在一起，但所有人都一致希望货币稳定。【原文：Asian officials went on the offense against the resurgent dollar, with some choosing to stand together but all united in their desire for currency stability.】

item.title: 欧洲天然气期权买盘在近期价格波动中跃升
item.description: 欧洲天然气价格的剧烈波动促使交易商纷纷买入期权合约，在中东冲突有升级风险的情况下，投资者寻求保护自己免受损失。【原文：Intense swings in European natural gas prices have prompted traders to pile into options contracts, with investors seeking to protect themselves against losses as the conflict in the Middle East risks escalation.】

item.title: 欧盟维斯塔格警告电信合并将带来竞争风险
item.description: 欧盟竞争事务主管玛格丽特-维斯塔格（Margrethe Vestager）警告说，欧洲大型电信企业的合并将削弱竞争，并扭曲该集团珍贵的单一市场，这显然是对欧盟一份新报告中要求加强合并的呼吁的反驳。【原文：Big telecoms mergers in Europe would cut competition and distort the bloc’s prized single market, the European Union’s competition chief Margrethe Vestager warned, in an apparent rebuttal of calls in a new EU report for more consolidation.】

item.title: Zimbabwe Central Bank Chief Says He’ll Curb Excessive ZiG Gains
item.description: Zimbabwe, whose currency declined 80% before being abandoned, is now worried about its new unit appreciating too fast.

item.title: Swiss Watch Exports Plunge as China and Hong Kong Demand Dries Up
item.description: Monthly Swiss watch exports suffered their biggest decline since 2020 as demand for premium and luxury timepieces in key markets including China and Hong Kong plunged.

item.title: Planisware Soars in Paris Debut After Raising About $300 Million
item.description: Software company Planisware jumped as much as 33% on its trading debut in Paris after raising 278 million euros ($297 million) as France — Europe’s biggest stock market — finally joins the bounce in the region’s share listings after a two-year drought.

item.title: Modi’s 100-Day Agenda Includes $1.2 Billion New Cities Plan
item.description: Indian government officials are discussing proposals to subsidize interest on home loans, create new urban centers and reduce bankruptcy delays as part of Prime Minister Narendra Modi’s 100-day agenda if he returns to office, people familiar with the matter said.

item.title: 中国红利股飙升至泡沫水平
item.description: 中国股市最热门的交易之一已达到令人眼花缭乱的高度，而监管机构的一项指导意见则为这一涨势火上浇油。【原文：One of the hottest trades in China’s stock market has reached dizzying heights, and a guideline by the regulator is adding fuel to the rally.】

item.title: 捷克央行行长称捷克无力加快降息步伐
item.description: 捷克央行董事会成员扬-普罗查兹卡（Jan Prochazka）表示，持续的通胀风险和美国联邦储备委员会发出的鹰派信号阻碍了捷克央行加快降息步伐。【原文：Persistent inflation risks and hawkish signals from the US Federal Reserve are preventing the Czech central bank from accelerating its interest-rate cuts, according to board member Jan Prochazka.】

item.title: 阿联酋领导人下令对创纪录降雨量造成的损失进行评估
item.description: 阿拉伯联合酋长国将评估本周早些时候袭击该国的强风暴对其基础设施造成的损害，这场风暴淹没了重要的高速公路，并中断了迪拜主要机场的运营。【原文：The United Arab Emirates will assess damage to its infrastructure from the severe storm that hit the country earlier this week, flooding vital highways and disrupting operations at Dubai’s main airport.】

item.title: 合作伙伴集团据称酝酿出售台湾太阳能企业福摩萨
item.description: 据知情人士透露，伙伴集团控股公司（Partners Group Holding AG）正在考虑出售台湾福懋太阳能股份有限公司（Formosa Solar Renewable Power Co.【原文：Partners Group Holding AG is weighing a sale of Taiwan’s Formosa Solar Renewable Power Co., according to people with knowledge of the matter.】

item.title: 中国 3 月青年失业率保持稳定
item.description: 一位官员警告说，中国年轻人的失业问题需要更严格的审查，在此之前，中国报告了 3 月份稳定的青年失业率。【原文：China reported a steady rate of youth unemployment in March after an official warned that joblessness among young Chinese needs more scrutiny.】

item.title: 欧洲 3 月汽车销量下降，电动汽车疲软态势持续
item.description: 由于包括大众汽车公司（Volkswagen AG）和Stellantis NV在内的汽车制造商面临需求疲软，尤其是电动汽车需求疲软，3月份欧洲乘用车销量下降了2.8%。【原文：Passenger-car sales in Europe fell 2.8% in March as automakers including Volkswagen AG and Stellantis NV faced weaker demand, particularly for electric vehicles.】

item.title: 富时 100 指数直播：英国市场现在的动向
开始一天生活所需的五件事欧洲
item.description:
及时了解市场监测情况

 

Get up to speed with what the markets are monitoring

 

】

item.title: 埃塞俄比亚交易所目标从 9 月起进行股票和债务交易
item.description: 埃塞俄比亚证券交易所计划最早于 9 月开始交易公司股票、政府发行的固定收益证券和货币市场产品，此举正值这个饱受战争蹂躏的国家寻求吸引新投资者之际。【原文：The Ethiopian Securities Exchange plans to begin trading company shares, government-issued fixed income securities and money-market products as early as September, a move that comes as the war-ravaged country looks to attract new investors.】

item.title: 利率押注转向，英伟达和芯片股陷入调整
item.description: 全球芯片股和人工智能风向标英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.）一起陷入技术性调整，显示出全球股市在过去一年半中最显著的驱动力有所放缓。【原文：A gauge of global chip stocks and AI bellwether Nvidia Corp. have fallen together into a technical correction, showing moderation in the global equity market’s most conspicuous driver over the past year and a half.】

item.title: 投资者的情感之旅— 去向何方？
item.description:
对经济着陆点看法的转变可能阻碍了通胀率的下降，而观察 "笨钱 "可能是明智之举。【原文：

Shifting views on economic landings may have thwarted the drop in inflation, while watching the ‘dumb money’ could be a smart move. 

】

item.title: 阿亚拉旗下 ACEN 斥资 150 亿美元将发电能力翻两番
item.description: 菲律宾企业集团阿亚拉公司（Ayala Corp.）旗下的能源部门 ACEN 公司首席执行官埃里克-弗兰西亚（Eric Francia）表示，该公司预计斥资 150 亿美元，到 2030 年将可再生能源发电能力翻两番，达到 20,000 兆瓦。【原文：ACEN Corp., the energy unit of Philippine conglomerate Ayala Corp., expects to spend $15 billion to quadruple its renewable power generation capacity to 20,000 megawatts by 2030, Chief Executive Officer Eric Francia said.】
